message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You were too generous, I'll take a bit more!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
You're not budging, I'll take what I can get!
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not getting any younger, I need a bigger share!

I'm not going to get a better deal, take it or leave it!
I've had enough, I'm willing to walk away. Take the whole thing, Bob!
